name: The Last Router
description:
Collaboration & Controller

The game is built in a way that allows you to collaborate with a teammate. Both players play as UFO characters and use their laser to reverse the gravity / pull the router. Player 1 (W | S) Player 2 (↑ | ↓)

Story

Routers are on the path to extinction. UFOs ( you ) are the world's last hope. You have the world's last router in your hands. Your mission is to keep it safe. stream the internet and bring it back to the world!

Single-Player Mode

for single-player Click (S)

Two-Players Mode

for two players Click (W) (Space) (Enter)
